definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: The subject of this study was the defatted fly maggot.
sentences.chinese: 本研究以经过脱脂处理的蝇蛆为试验材料。

sentences.english: Cocoa paste, whether or not defatted.
A defatted pine-nut milk drink was developed from pine-nut.
sentences.chinese: 以脱脂松籽为原料，开发研制了松籽乳饮料。

sentences.english: Add half the buttermilk mixture and mix until combined.
sentences.chinese: 增加一半脱脂酸牛奶混合物搅拌，直到组合。

sentences.english: All our drinks come with whole milk, unless you ordred something different. We also offer nonfat milk.
sentences.chinese: 所有饮品均选用全脂奶，你可选择脱脂奶。

sentences.english: The conditions of the soybean oligosaccharide production from soybean cake are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究从脱脂豆粕中提取大豆低聚糖的制备工艺。

sentences.english: The Pritikin Diet, everything is non-fat milk in these diets.
sentences.chinese: 《普林逖金减肥法》里，所有一切脱脂牛奶。

sentences.english: Debinding is the key process for Ceramic Injection Molding (CIM).
sentences.chinese: 脱脂是陶瓷注射成形工艺的制约性步骤。

sentences.english: If the degreasing lipoprotein is insufficient or defective, it will lead to hyperlipaemia.
sentences.chinese: 如果脱脂脂蛋白不足或有缺陷，将会出现高脂血症。

sentences.english: Soybean isoflavones were extracted by water from defatted soybean flour.
sentences.chinese: 以水为主要溶媒，提取脱脂大豆粉中的大豆异黄酮。

sentences.english: Rach, does this have nonfat milk?
sentences.chinese: 瑞秋，里面有没有脱脂奶？

sentences.english: When the panel surface is soiled, wipe it with absorbent cotton or other soft cloth.
sentences.chinese: 面板表面弄脏时，用脱脂棉或其他软布擦拭。

sentences.english: When designing a continuous type carburizing furnace, it is necessary to take account of degreasing.
sentences.chinese: 连续式渗碳炉设计时，应考虑脱脂问题。

sentences.english: And you can cut down fat and sugar more by using skim milk and an artificial sweetener.
sentences.chinese: 并且可以使用脱脂奶和人工甜味剂减少脂肪和糖。

sentences.english: Rather than pouring yourself a glass of fruit juice, try adding skim milk to your morning routine.
sentences.chinese: 与其喝果汁，不如试着在你的早餐你加点脱脂牛奶吧。

sentences.english: Use low-fat or nonfat versions of these condiments.
sentences.chinese: 尽量使用低脂或脱脂的上述食品。
